title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
descr: Operate underground loading or moving machine to load or move coal, ore, or rock using shuttle or mine car or conveyors. Equipment may include power shovels, hoisting engines equipped with cable-drawn scraper or scoop, or machines equipped with gathering arms and conveyor.
alt_titles: Buggy Driver, Buggy Man, Buggy Operator, Buggy Runner, Car Dropper, Car Dumper, Car Pincher, Cart Driver, Coal Hauler Operator, Coke Loader, Continuous Miner Operator, Equipment Loader Operator, Equipment Operator, Front End Loader Operator, Joy Loader, Joy Loading Machine Operator, Joy Operator, Load Haul Dump Operator (LHD Operator), Loader, Loader Operator, Loading Machine Operator, Machine Loader, Mechanical Shovel Operator, Mine Shuttle Car Operator, Miner, Miner Operator, Mobile Bridge Conveyor Operator, Monitor Car Operator, Muck Hauler, Muck Operator, Mucker Operator, Mucking Machine Operator, Pit Loader Operator, Plant Loader Operator, Production Miner, Ram Car Operator, Shuttle Buggy Operator, Shuttle Car Operator, Shuttle Driver, Shuttle Officer, Shuttle Operator, Skid Loader Operator, Underground Miner, Wheel Loader Operator, Yard Loader, Yard Loader Operator
experience: Some previous work-related skill, knowledge, or experience is usually needed. For example, a teller would benefit from experience working directly with the public.
education: These occupations usually require a high school diploma.
job_training: Employees in these occupations need anywhere from a few months to one year of working with experienced employees. A recognized apprenticeship program may be associated with these occupations.
example: These occupations often involve using your knowledge and skills to help others. Examples include orderlies, counter and rental clerks, customer service representatives, security guards, upholsterers, tellers, and dental laboratory technicians.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Handle high voltage sources and hang electrical cables.
work_tasks.descr: Handle high voltage sources and hang electrical cables.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Drive loaded shuttle cars to ramps and move controls to discharge loads into mine cars or onto conveyors.
work_tasks.descr: Drive loaded shuttle cars to ramps and move controls to discharge loads into mine cars or onto conveyors.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Pry off loose material from roofs and move it into the paths of machines, using crowbars.
work_tasks.descr: Pry off loose material from roofs and move it into the paths of machines, using crowbars.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Move trailing electrical cables clear of obstructions, using rubber safety gloves.
work_tasks.descr: Move trailing electrical cables clear of obstructions, using rubber safety gloves.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Control conveyors that run the entire length of shuttle cars to distribute loads as loading progresses.
work_tasks.descr: Control conveyors that run the entire length of shuttle cars to distribute loads as loading progresses.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Operate levers to move conveyor booms or shovels so that mine contents such as coal, rock, and ore can be placed into cars or onto conveyors.
work_tasks.descr: Operate levers to move conveyor booms or shovels so that mine contents such as coal, rock, and ore can be placed into cars or onto conveyors.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Clean, fuel, service, and perform safety checks on all equipment, and repair and replace parts as necessary.
work_tasks.descr: Clean, fuel, service, and perform safety checks on all equipment, and repair and replace parts as necessary.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Clean hoppers, and clean spillage from tracks, walks, driveways, and conveyor decking.
work_tasks.descr: Clean hoppers, and clean spillage from tracks, walks, driveways, and conveyor decking.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Stop gathering arms when cars are full.
work_tasks.descr: Stop gathering arms when cars are full.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Move mine cars into position for loading and unloading, using pinchbars inserted under car wheels to position cars under loading spouts.
work_tasks.descr: Move mine cars into position for loading and unloading, using pinchbars inserted under car wheels to position cars under loading spouts.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Observe hand signals, grade stakes, or other markings when operating machines.
work_tasks.descr: Observe hand signals, grade stakes, or other markings when operating machines.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Examine roadway and clear obstructions from the path of travel.
work_tasks.descr: Examine roadway and clear obstructions from the path of travel.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Drive machines into piles of material blasted from working faces.
work_tasks.descr: Drive machines into piles of material blasted from working faces.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Oil, lubricate, and adjust conveyors, crushers, and other equipment, using hand tools and lubricating equipment.
work_tasks.descr: Oil, lubricate, and adjust conveyors, crushers, and other equipment, using hand tools and lubricating equipment.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Monitor loading processes to ensure that materials are loaded according to specifications.
work_tasks.descr: Monitor loading processes to ensure that materials are loaded according to specifications.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Measure, weigh, or verify levels of rock, gravel, or other excavated material to prevent equipment overloads.
work_tasks.descr: Measure, weigh, or verify levels of rock, gravel, or other excavated material to prevent equipment overloads.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Replace hydraulic hoses, headlight bulbs, and gathering-arm teeth.
work_tasks.descr: Replace hydraulic hoses, headlight bulbs, and gathering-arm teeth.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Advance machines to gather material and convey it into cars.
work_tasks.descr: Advance machines to gather material and convey it into cars.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Read written instructions or confer with supervisors about schedules and materials to be moved.
work_tasks.descr: Read written instructions or confer with supervisors about schedules and materials to be moved.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Notify switching departments to deliver specific types of cars.
work_tasks.descr: Notify switching departments to deliver specific types of cars.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Signal workers to move loaded cars.
work_tasks.descr: Signal workers to move loaded cars.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Guide and stop cars by switching, applying brakes, or placing scotches, or wooden wedges, between wheels and rails.
work_tasks.descr: Guide and stop cars by switching, applying brakes, or placing scotches, or wooden wedges, between wheels and rails.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Inspect boarding and locking of open-top box cars and wedging of side-drop and hopper cars to prevent loss of material in transit.
work_tasks.descr: Inspect boarding and locking of open-top box cars and wedging of side-drop and hopper cars to prevent loss of material in transit.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Maintain records of materials moved.
work_tasks.descr: Maintain records of materials moved.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Observe and record car numbers, carriers, customers, tonnages, and grades and conditions of material.
work_tasks.descr: Observe and record car numbers, carriers, customers, tonnages, and grades and conditions of material.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Direct other workers to move stakes, place blocks, position anchors or cables, or move materials.
work_tasks.descr: Direct other workers to move stakes, place blocks, position anchors or cables, or move materials.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Push or ride cars down slopes, or hook cars to cables and control cable drum brakes, to ease cars down inclines.
work_tasks.descr: Push or ride cars down slopes, or hook cars to cables and control cable drum brakes, to ease cars down inclines.

work_tasks.title: Loading and Moving Machine Operators, Underground Mining
work_tasks.task: Open and close bottom doors of cars to dump contents.
work_tasks.descr: Open and close bottom doors of cars to dump contents.
